name: Edward Sun
memories: This is you guys at the amusement park for your 75th birthday. You were so happy that he finally came back from his job in Europe. You guys hugged for a long time

This is you helping him fix his bike when he was 10. He scraped his knee pretty bad but after you fixed the bike, he was very happy again and wanted to get back on the back right then and there and asked you to teach him how to ride it
This is you guys when you went to see avatar for the first time. You didn't like the movie very much but still bought th shirt merch because your son asked and he cried that he wanted it.
